title: i cant play with my shoes off
body: For some reason i just cannot play lol without my shoes on, i can for any other game but when i play lol i NEED to have shoes on while playing. Anyone else have this habit or something similar?

replies.body:
> nah, ur just %%%%en weird.

To be quite blunt yes, this is somewhat of an odd habit/need.

Also I got a little confused with the layout of your statement
> For some reason **i just cannot play lol without my shoes on**, i can for any other game but when i play lol **i NEED to have shoes on while playing**. Anyone else have this habit or something similar?

First you say you cannot play with shoes on, then you say you need them to play?

> [{quoted}](name=Musterpulse,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=FRlxf1R3,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2014-12-14T08:06:44.591+0000)
> To be quite blunt yes, this is somewhat of an odd habit/need.
> 
> Also I got a little confused with the layout of your statement
> 
> First you say you cannot play with shoes on, then you say you need them to play?

he said he can't play without them on.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=FRlxf1R3,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2014-12-14T08:19:36.447+0000)
> he said he can't play without them on

The title does clarify that, but it's just a mistake worth patching up.

> [{quoted}](name=Musterpulse,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=FRlxf1R3,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2014-12-14T08:55:59.531+0000)
> The title does clarify that, but it's just a mistake worth patching up.

there is no mistake though.  he says he can't with with his shoes off. then he says he can't play without them on. they mean the same thing. then he says he needs them on to play. that also means the same thing. where is the mistake.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=FRlxf1R3,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2014-12-14T09:38:26.955+0000)
> there is no mistake though.  he says he can't with with his shoes off. then he says he can't play without them on. they mean the same thing. then he says he needs them on to play. that also means the same thing. where is the mistake.

Ahhh I see now, as a matter of fact it was my mistake for not reading carefully enough hahaha.
What playing Lee Sin does to you.{{champion:64}}
Barefoot is the most comfortable thing though, at least at home.

Sometimes if I'm playing late at night I use my laptop and sit in my bean bag . . . then I fall asleep and I got woken up like 7 minutes later with my friends on Skype screaming because I'm just standing at blue buff.
if you have to carry your team you need comfortable shoes :)
Need to be listening to music, otherwise I panic and don't engage.
i can only play naked otherwise i cant concentrate .
